name: Pumpkin Brussels Sprout Tart
ingredients: 1/4 medium – Red Kurt or Butternut Squash
instructions: Peel the pumpkin and cut it into cubes
Remove the outer slices of the brussels sprouts and slice finely
Season garlic, squash, sprouts with olive oil, salt, pepper, cinnamon, and cayenne pepper
Put pastry on a lined baking sheet
Spread cream cheese and crumbled feta leaving 1″ border
Spoon vegetable mix on top of the cream cheese
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes until veggies are tender and pastry is golden
Thinly slice the leak and add to a pan over medium heat with olive oil, thyme, and honey
Cook for 10 minutes or until softened and slightly brown
Toast the pecans whole, then chop roughly
Once tart is done, add leak, toasted pecans, some feta, thyme to the tart
